column4: I think I might of gotten a magnet near my hdd lol, how do I manually start the maintence thing that occurs monthly
try running "run sudo fdisk -l". this will list the partitions on your hard drive. Then run "sudo fsck /dev/*" where * is each partition that you found using the previous command
You should actually run fsck /dev/whatever from a live cd because it is dangerous to run it if it's in use... and it would be in use if you are running the computer with it
so the easy way would be to just take the CD that you installed ubuntu with and use that to run the check
